comments.body: @use-strict are you comfortable with the PR as-is?
Does this version track something external?

I could have used
```suggestion
        parent?: NodeModule | null;
```
of course, but I was going for exact parity with the node types:
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/1c2240f6cecbe84f5a5e257bdcef76709a57257b/types/node/ts3.1/globals.d.ts#L580
